title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 346.11 - Examination procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 346.11 - Examination procedure

State Regulations

When an examination is had under section 13-1(3) of the

Workers' Compensation Law, it shall be by a qualified chiropractor or physician
at a place reasonably convenient to the claimant and in the presence of the
claimant's chiropractor or physician, if in the latter's opinion his presence
is necessary. A duplicate copy of all notices of request for such examination
shall be sent to the attending chiropractor or physician. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
346.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
